text: Henriettea is a genus of flowering plants in the family Melastomataceae. It is distributed in the Americas.Henriettea. Kew Science Plants of the World Online. Some species in the genus are known commonly as camasey.Henriettea. United States Department of Agriculture NRCS Plants Database. Species include: *Henriettea acunae *Henriettea aggregata *Henriettea angustifolia *Henriettea barkeri *Henriettea fascicularis - camasey peludo * Henriettea granularis * Henriettea granulata O.Berg & Triana *Henriettea macfadyenii – MacFadyen's camasey * Henriettea membranifolia - thinleaf camasey * Henriettea punctata * Henriettea squamata *Henriettea squamulosum - jusillo *Henriettea triflora *Henriettea tuberculosa *Henriettea uniflora *Henriettea verrucosa *Henriettea williamsii ==References== Category:Melastomataceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Henriettea
